title: CAA विरोध-प्रदर्शन: नहीं, बेंगलुरु पुलिस ने इतिहासकार रामचंद्र गुहा को मुक्का मारने की कोशिश नहीं की
author: www.altnews.in
vclaim: Is this cop threatening to hit ⁦@Ram_Guha⁩ with his fist? It’s bad enough to arrest a senior historian exercising his democratic right to protest. But to do so with the threat of force is disgraceful & the cop deserves stern disciplinary action. Does the Home Minister care? pic.twitter.com/ogjD47pgsd
